channel.title: debina on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in debina on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Can't remember how I made journal entries on Debian
item.description: 11:25 Tuesday 30 September 2015 JST I just added all the crap above by tweaking a copy from a previous entry. Didn’t I have a slick way to make entries on this Debian box? Emacs would be my guess, but I don’t see it installed. wut. Maybe I just didn’t set it up again after I wiped the machine and installed everything (else) again.
